Coinega sahena 'iyadao ta'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , ma hesiyage taboi mumugada ma 'ida paihowa ta'itayahi , ma 'ane gesowana 'iyadai 'aigeda ta'abi'abi hewe'a 'ina 'etala he'asisi weyahina .
Ma taiyawedi mumugadi ta 'idi paihowao bwebwe'adi , Yehoba nata hepwatu ma he'asisi ma miya daumwala 'i'ebwaedi , nugeta meYudiya 'oidiya 'i'ebwaya , ee 'abwa 'asa ganamuli 'oidiya .

'aiwe ganinisa madoudi sigibodiya , ta wete 'aleha 'oinega si'abihetediya , weyahina 'idi tuta siwe'a 'oina ma tuwa sihewaiwaiya , ma wete 'aleha 'oina sihewaiwai hedadeya , ta 'adi 'alehao baibaiwa hedade sipa'ipa'i lelewanedi .
Bewa tuwa ma tuta 'inaonaoma 'oidiya geya'abwa wete 'eta taiya 'igihe 'wate'wategau , weyahina wahiguwa Yesu 'ina 'ila'ilala simiyamiya , beno weyaedi yalobediya 'ina paihowa 'oina .
Eeta 'aigeda anelose waiwaina dimwa madou hedade 'i'abi haneheya ta holai 'iula suluheya , 'igwaeya , “ Casaina madouna Babiloni 'abwa 'ibe'u da'ule bewa gide , ma geya'abwa wete ta'ita'ita hila .
Ciyagwao , 'ilobwainegomiya ma tapwalolo dumwaluna wa'abiyahi momosi ma 'oinega wagihe pa'aligomi , ma wete Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina waiwaiyega wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ,

Sahena bale'u mumugana 'oina watagwa tagwalegomi , ma hesi wahimi mabwaiyana watagwaledi Yehoba 'oina . Coinega 'imi nuwatuhuwao Yehoba 'i'abi hehauhaudi , ma 'ina nuwatuhu bwebwe'adi ta yaliyaliyayadi ma dumwadumwaludi wasanapudi .
Ta wete taugu loheya galagu . Weyahina Yehoba 'ana tohemisao ya'abihe muyemuyediya , 'oinega Keliso 'ana tohepwailao mabwaiyadi sibwebwe'ana sinegauwa .
Ciyagwao , geya'abwa bale'u bewa nuwami 'i'ewa'ewa , weyahina 'eguma bale'u tobwatobwanao nuwami 'i'ewa , bewa 'oinega Tamadai wanuwanaide , ma geya wada helauweya .
Tasigwao , sahena 'iyamiyao mumugadi weyahina wahehetalapili , weyahina 'eguma 'iyamiyao wahehetala piliyedi ma 'omi wete mumuga 'aigedaina wapaipaihowa , beno waboi tuwa wahehetala piliyegomi .

Coinega tohanugetaedi , Yemesa ma Pita ma Yoni , taudi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oiguwa si'ita lobeya , eeta sitagwala Banaba ma taugu 'oima , ta mahetemayao 'anima'abiya . Ee , sitetoiyedi tohekalesiyao si'ahwa tonugetaediya , sitetoiyedi sitagwala 'oima ma 'abehega taugu ma Banaba 'atauya tomiya ganamuli 'oidiya , ma taudi hesi sitauya meYudiya dimo 'oidiya .

Muliyetega tolo'alehaedi taudi Yesu si'abi hekeloseyeya sitehataedi Yesuina 'ana 'ale'o si'ewediya ma siboidimo 'oidiya siheguyaiyeya . Cana hewanu wete si'eweya ma sigwae , “ Cale'o bewa tabataba hedadena ma wete saliyana , geya 'ana tubwemo . Coinega nata geya'abwa tahahaigaigali , ma hesiyage 'e'opi'opi 'aigeda tapaihowa gidemusa kati . Ma 'oinega 'eguma taiya 'inugeta hewanu bewa 'i'ewa . ”
Taiya 'owa hali tomota 'oidiya 'uhehe'ita , ma togidega 'owa ? Ceguma 'oidiya 'ugwae , “ Sahena yagaha ” , ma 'owa toyagaha 'aigeda .

Coinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega wahida Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina hada , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuina Yehoba 'oinega 'itauyama ma 'aloda 'imiyamiya , ma geya'abwa taudamo taloiloinegita , ma hesi Yehoba 'ida loinegita .
Keliso 'ina helauwega 'agwaegwae , weyahina tauna tuwa 'ama toloina . Moisa tuwa , tauna mabwaiyada weyahida 'i'amasa , 'oinega mabwaiyada gide to'amasao .
Ciyagwao , 'omi ma taugu Yehoba 'ihesinuwegita 'ina tupwa weyahina , 'ilobwaineya ma Yesu tanuwatuhuyahi , weyahina tauna 'ida tapwalolo 'ana tohepwaila ta wete 'ida topwaoli madouna ,

Mumugagu bewa 'oidiyega yahe'ita pwaigomiya 'abehega 'ilobwainegita ma tauda 'ida paihowega towe'a ta'abihetedi . Gidemusa Bada Yesu 'ina gwae wanuwatuhuyahi , beno 'igwaeya , 'Cewamo geya yaliyayenamo , ma 'ebwaya hesi mayaliyayaina madouna . ’ ”
Mabwaiyami hai 'ana loina wahe'asisiye ma sahena wanuwanuwa 'ubuna , weyahina tolopuiyao ta tologwaliyao 'abwa Yehoba 'iloinedi .
ma galihina 'oina 'i'etuluha 'i'ita luhuwa galihinamo , beno 'ale'odimo si'eno'eno . Loheyainaina galihina 'oina geya 'iluhu .

Ma nage 'oina namala ta dagugu ta gugula ta wete mwani'ini'i madoudi silatuwa . Mwalo hene ta nige , tomota 'idi tuta 'oina , geya 'eta mwani'ini'i 'ana madou nage gide 'ida latu'esa . Ma bewa moisa gala hedade .

Ma 'ahena yabe'u talutalubu'iya ta ya'e'etuluha 'oina , ma 'oinega 'igwaeya , “ Geya'abwa gide . Taugu tuwa Yesu 'ina topaihowa 'owa gide , ma wete gide tasimwao taudi Yesu 'ana tohepwailao . Yehoba hesi 'oina 'u'etuluha . ” Weyahina Yesu 'ana tohepwailao 'adi lotohona gide palopitao 'adi lotohona Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'oinega .
Ta hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega Yehoba sanapuina 'i'abilatuheya 'oida , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana ginaula mabwaiyana 'isanapudiya . Coinega Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu dahwadahwaidi wete 'isanapudiya .
Eeta 'eguma to tuta 'ilatuwa 'oimiya , Bada saninega wabwauwe ma'imi yaliyaya 'oina . Ta tupwadi Bada 'ina topaihowao , 'eguma sitauyawa 'oimiya , wahe'asisiyanedi gidemusa Epapiloditoina .
Gwagwama 'omi wete sauga mabwaiyana tamamiyao ma sinamiyao 'enadi wamuliyedi , bewa 'ida Bada 'ina 'ebeyaliyaya .

Caigeda nuwatuhu weyahina yayaliyaya madouna , beno yasanapuya moisa 'ima mumuga 'ausalana ma dumwaluna tomota 'oidiya , geya sanapu bale'u 'oidiyega , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oima 'oinega , ma gide 'apaihowa madouna 'oimiya .

Ma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma 'igu loina wasanapudiya ma wahematamatanedi , 'omi moisa wahelauwegauwa . Coinega Tamagu 'omi nata wete 'ihelauwegomi , ma wete taugu nata yahelauwegomi , ma yaboi yahe'itaegau 'oimiya . ”

Moisa , loinaedi 'adi 'ita gide sanapu moisa , weyahina 'adi tomuliyaowedi ma'idi he'asisi ta ma'idi nuwasulu sipaipaihowa , ta wete wahidi sihemuyedi ; ma tuwa geya 'eta 'idi waiwaimo , ma hesi wahidi 'idi nuwatuhu dahwana 'iloinaedi .

Ma tasidaowedi 'eguma sihilama 'ino helau 'oidiya weyahina sihehepwaila tohekalesiyao 'oima . Moisa tuwa , taudi Yehoba 'ina topaihowao , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya 'eguma si'ebe'ebesinegomi nima'abiyadi wete wa'ebwaedi .
Ma wete 'ahwa panapanawa besobeso 'u'ebesinedi , weyahina 'ahwa panapanawa 'aleha 'ina 'ebelatu .

Coinega geya 'aigeda 'ahubodaboda manida 'imiyamiya , ma Bada 'ina wasawasa 'asi'asilalana 'oina ta'e'ebubuna , ta tupwana ma tupwana 'ibuibuigita tauna 'ana 'ita 'asi'asilalana gide . Paihowa bewa Badaina 'oinega , tauna yaluyaluwa tuwa .

Ta hesi Keliso bweyahina 'ebe 'abihe'ehau bwebwe'ana hedade , weyahina 'ateda 'i'abihe'ehaudi ma 'oinega paihowa besobeso talogwahatedi , ta Yehobaina mayawasina 'ina paihowao tapaihowadi . Weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna miyamiya hatayana Keliso 'i'abihe waiwaiya , ta tauna ma'ina mumuga mabwaiyana dumwaluna ta geya 'aigeda wete galana 'oina , 'oinega tauna 'ipwaoliyeya Yehoba 'oina , beno 'i'amasa tauda 'ada 'ehau weyahina .
Yehoba 'ina 'ebwayaina 'oidiya gidemusa tauda 'oida tutaina tagimi hemisa Bada Yesu Keliso 'oina . Ma taugu geya sosowagu Yehoba 'ina paihowa bewa ya'etobode . ”
Geya'abwa Yaluyaluwa Tabuna nuwana wagihegihegala , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabunaina gide 'ila'ilala 'oida , 'abehega 'abwa 'ada gihe'ehau taloba .

Ma mwalo he'itaina sihe'itegomiya ta wahesagoheya , sowasowana wanuwatuhuyahi ma wanuwahila eema wamuliya bwaibwaini . Ma 'eguma geya 'enowega wada toholowa , 'abwa 'oimiya yatauyawa ma yalohe'ate yohogomi gidemusa toyagaha , ta geya wasanapu tolahisa yalatuwa .
Natugwao , geya'abwa he'ita 'abo'abodi wamulimuliye , ma hesi nuwami 'ida sabwalena , 'abehega 'eguma taiyawedi taudi 'idi mumuga 'ausalana , taudi beno tobwebwe'ana , gidemusa Keliso .

Ciyagwao , sahena yaluyaluwa mabwaiyadi wahemihemisaedi , ma hesi watohodi , bwebwe'adi bo nuwana galadi . Ceguma taudi bwebwe'adi tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba 'oinega sitauyama , ma taudi galadi hali tupwega sitauyama , weyahina bewa tuta palopita 'abo'abowao sihapwehapwesa mayaluyaluwadi geya Yehoba 'oinega .

Coinega tasigwao , wasanapu bwaibwaini 'abehega loheyaina 'oinega 'imi puiyao 'adi nuwasam waloba . Ma 'eguma taiya tauna 'oina 'ihemisa , 'ina puiyao 'oidiyega 'ilihasi . Ta hesi Mosese 'ina loina geya sowasowahina 'ilihasigomi .
Ciyagwao , 'ilobwainegomiya wete ma 'ida Bada 'oina wada yaliyaya . Mwalo 'ami loina yaleleyawa , ta bewa tuwa wete nuwanuwagu ma yalele hilawa , ma 'oinega wamiya bwebwe'ana .

Ma 'eguma taiya 'igomale , 'ina hada nobwa 'i'ai nugeta , ta 'oinega gesowana 'i'ai'ai hedade tapwalolo 'alona , tabu ma Yehoba 'igamwasowalegomi 'imi tapwalolo 'ana 'ita galana weyahina . Beno tuwa , loinaina weyahina . Ma hesi tupwana 'ami loina wete simiyamiya . Ceguma tutaina yanaowa loinaedi wete ya'abihe dumwaludi 'oimiya .

Ma Pailatoina wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Hede 'omi wanaoma watoe ma watauye nobwa waboi 'imi loina 'oidiyega waheyatalae . ” Coinega meYudiyaedi sigwae , “ Geya 'eta wete 'ama tagwala ma 'eta taiya 'ina 'amasa weyahina 'aloina ma 'alohe'amasi . ”
Paihowaedi mabwaiyana Yehoba 'iheguyaiyeya 'oida , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma heguheguyai bwebwe'adi nuwami 'i'ewa , ma wete 'eda 'ausalana moisa yahe'itegomi , beno helau .

Moisa , Yesuina sawasawahina ma 'ihetopwaoli weyahida , weyahina tauna mumugana mabwaiyana 'ausalana tuwa , ta geya gide togala tauda , 'oinega Yehoba Yesuina 'i'abilagasiya ta galewa 'ana tomiyao 'ilohane sinediya .
sawasawahigu miya mabwaiyana 'oidiya yada yaliyaya tuwa , weyahina tauna mahetegu 'igihe waiwaiyegauwa .
Yehoba nuwanuwana 'imi miya 'ausaladi , ma sahena wapuipui ,
Wa'itayahigomi ma sahena 'imi 'ahwanoi siwe'awe'a , ma hesi waloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , ma wahe'alama'i'itana 'imi 'ahwanoi 'oidiya .
“ Gwae bewa Mosese 'ihesagoheya ma 'i'ateyohowa ta 'idena , ma 'ihetaumana tupwa Midiyani 'oina , ma nobwa 'ihaiya ma natunao loheloheyadi 'eluwa 'ihenatunediya .

Tapwalolo 'alona loheya geya sawasawahina debana 'i'ahusam , weyahina loheya 'ana 'ita Yehoba gidemusa , ta wete 'ana hepwatu Yehoba 'ana hepwatu gidemusa . Wahine wete 'ana hepwatu loheya 'ana hepwatu gidemusa .
Ta wete Keliso 'ina nuwadaumwala nuwami 'iloinaedi . Bewa weyahina Yehoba mabwaiyada 'ibwauwegita ma taheboda 'aigeda , ma weyahina taloyauwedo 'oina .

Yehoba ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ihemasalehediya tauna 'iboi weyahina , eeta nuwanuwana natunao baibaiwadi 'itoedima tauna 'ina tupwa wasawasa 'oina . Cilobwaineya ma Yehobaina 'ada To'abihetenaina 'i'abihe 'asilale . Bewa lamuna muya madouna 'ilotohoya , ma hesi tuwa 'i'alama'i'ita , ta 'oinega mumugana mabwaiyana dumwadumwaluna .
To'aha weyahina 'aleha ma he'ahupanapanawa silatulatu 'oimiya ? Nuwana waboi 'imi nuwa'ubuna 'oidiyega , weyahina tuta mabwaiyana hali mumuga ma hali mumuga 'alomiya sipaipaihowa .
Cimi pui yahesagoheya weyahina 'aigeda loheya 'oimiyega tamana mwanena mahetena sipuiya . Pui beno gala hedada . Taudi tomiya ganamuli gogo baibaiwana 'oidiya geya gidemusa sida mumuga 'esa .

Weyahina 'ebe tohowedi 'oidiyega Seitani 'itohotohogomi , mabwaiyada wete 'itohotohogita , ta hesi Yehoba tahemisaeya weyahina 'ina loina 'ilaguya ma sahena Seitani 'itohotoho hedadegita . Eema 'eguma tahe'alama'i'itana nata 'eda bwebwe'ana 'ihe'itegita ma 'oinega 'ebe tohowedi tahewaiwai sinedi .
“ Yasanasanapu wete nata 'igu tauya mulina tohe'itao galadi , gide 'edewa sasasasaidi , sinaoma ma 'imi sipiyao si'abihe galadi .

Coinega tohekalesiyao tupwa mabwaiyadi matadiya 'ahehepwatuwegomi , 'agwae , “ Moisa taudi Tesalonaika to'alama'i'ita hedade . Bwagana 'adi 'alehao mwau madouna si'ebwaedi , ma tuwa ma'idi 'alama'i'ita ta wete ma'idi hemisa Yehoba 'oina . ”
Geya 'eta tuta mebale'u Yehoba sida 'iteya , ma tauda hesi 'eguma tahelau hilegita beno Yehoba mahetedai , ma 'ina helau moisa 'ateda 'imiyamiya .

Taugu Paulo Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila 'aigeda , ta 'igu hetohepwaila geya tomota 'idi hesinuwega ma hesi Yesu 'ina hesinuwega , ma Tamada Yehoba wete 'ina hesinuwa . Tauna Yesu Keliso 'amasega 'igihetoholo hileya .
Yesuina wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'i'alama'i'ita madouna togala 'idi lo'aleha 'oinega , ta 'oinega 'omi wete gide 'abehega sahena wahesabulolo nuwana wawe'awe'a .
Weyahina 'eguma 'ina 'amasaina tauda gidemusa ta'amasa , eema 'ane tatoholo hila gidemusa tauna 'amasega 'itoholo hila .
Ma wete 'ina gwae 'aigeda 'igwaeneya , “ Comi tomiya ganamuli Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao mahetemiyao 'abwa wayaliyaya . ”
Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ihepwaila latuwa 'abehega tuta 'ana 'ebe gumwala 'oina tomota tupwadi nata tapwalolo silogwahate ma yaluyaluwa galadi ma Tomudulele 'idi he'ita 'abo'abowedi sihesagohedi .
Wete 'uhenuwa lagudi ma 'asa 'ana toloinao 'idi loina 'oidiya sitagwaledi , ma sihematamatana , ta paihowa bwebwe'adi sipaihowadi .
Taudi genuwadi sinuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mwalo hene Yehoba 'ina gwaeyega galewa 'ilatuwa , ma bwasi 'alonega bale'u 'ipaihoweya bwasiyega ,

Gidemusa tuwa , Keliso ma'aigeda 'i'amasa 'ida galao weyahidi , ma tauna loheya bwebwe'ana , ma tauda galagalaida ma weyahida 'i'amasa , ta 'oinega 'itoegita Yehoba 'oina . Ma Keliso wahinamo silohe'amasiya , ma yaluyaluwana geya .

Taudi geya sisanapu mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ana 'eda , ma hesi he'ita 'abo'abodi simulimuliyedi , ee nata galana siloba . Ma hesi taudi mumuga bwebwe'anaina ma Yehoba 'ina loina 'ehauna 'ana tomuliyao , 'eguma si'ebesine sigala moisa .
Ciyamayao , wete 'ahenuwa lagugomi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega , ma 'ane 'iyadao tupwadi tolowahi'wata wa'ebesinedi , weyahina lowahi'wata geya tauma 'ahe'itegomi , ma guibigamo 'ana 'eda hesi .
Mwalo heneyage pui bale'uwa 'ilatuma loheya 'aigeda 'oinega , ta mumuga galana 'amasa 'itoeyama ee 'oinega 'amasa 'iyada tomota mabwaiyada 'oida , weyahina tomota mabwaiyada togala .

Taudi 'idi hemisega sihewaiwaiya 'adi 'alehao 'oidiyega , ma wete 'idi tomotao siloina dumwaluwediya , ma wete Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa huwaina silobediya , ma wete laiyoni lolosasaidi si'abi hedaumwalidiya , ta wete
Cama mwau loheloheya si'ebwaemaiya , ma tuwa Keliso 'abwa ba'idamai 'amiyamiya . Wete sihunuhunumai , ma hesi geya silohe'amasimai .
Comi tohemisa 'abo'abowao ! Ceguma bale'u mumugaina wahelauweya , beno Yehoba walo'aleheya , weyahina 'eguma taiya bale'u mumugaina nuwanuwana , tauna Yehoba 'ana 'aleha .
Coinega Paulo ma 'iyanao tupwa Piligiya ma Galetiya 'alodiyega sitautau , ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'i'ausidiya ma sahena Yehoba tetelina tupwa Esiya 'oina siloguloguguyae .

Ma bewa tutaina tauda 'ida hemisa 'abehega Yehoba tauna 'i'abi 'ehaugita , ma tauna weyahina Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Geya sowana 'eta taiya 'oimiyega 'inuwatuhu ma 'igwae , ‘ Taiya nata 'ihane Galewa ? ’ ” Bewa gwaeina 'ana sanapu 'abehega , “ Taiya nata Keliso 'itoeyama . ”

Coinega anelose nugenugetana 'inaowa ta 'ina biyo bale'uwa 'isiweya , ta bwe'a galadi ta muyadi silatuwa taudi hebai 'ina dimwa tagitagina 'ana to'etuluha 'oidiya , taudi beno hebaiina 'ana 'ila'ilala 'oidiya 'imiyamiya .

Pepaina 'i'eweya ta hebahebaiyedi ma wete babadaowedi lamiina 'oina sibe'u talutalubu'iya , 'oina si'e'etuluha , ta 'aigeda 'aigeda ma'idi 'ebe gihedohedou sihunuhunu , ma wete ma'idi gaeba goula bwebwe'adi , ma ginaula 'aigeda 'alodiya 'igabugabu mahaina 'ausalana , ta 'ana nuwasabwalena beno Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao 'idi 'ahwanoi 'ihanehane 'oina .
Ceguma mabwaiyada Yesu tahemise 'abehega tauna To'abihetena , tauda Yehoba natunao . Ma wete 'eguma Tamana tahehelauwe , natuna gidemusa tahelauwe .
Ma geya'abwa tanuwanuwahane bo 'iyadao talowahi'watedi , bo tahe'ipi'ipiyedi .
Sahena babadao 'uheheliyedi , ma hesi hohobigega 'ulohatotowedi , gide tuwa tamau 'oina 'uhehegwaegwae , ma wete 'a pateyao 'u'ahwa'ahwa tasinaedi ;

Ma wamumuga bwebwe'ana taudi geya meYudiya 'oidiya . Weyahina bewa tuwa 'abwa si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegomi , ma tuta muliyetega 'imi paihowa bwebwe'ana si'ita , ma 'oinega tutaina Yehoba 'ilatuma Yehobaina sihepwatuwe .
Eeta yahetapewa madouna tohekalesiyao yagihe 'am'amnediya , ta geya 'eta wete Mosese 'ina loinao yaligeligehi .
Coinega 'ihesilalediya 'igwae , “ To sauga gide 'oina natugu 'iyawesaiya ? ” Ma taudi sigwae , “ Boi 'asudiladila 'ana gamwagamwana 'oina ma wahina mabwaiyana 'iyawesaiya . ”

Ma meYudiyaedi 'idi tohanugetao Pailato 'oina si'ahwanoiya , ma 'eguma sawasawahina 'itagwala 'oidiya ma loheloheyaedi kelose 'oidiya sisanasanana 'ahedi silasadi , ma 'oinega si'amasa mwayamwayau , eeta 'adi kelose 'oidiyega si'ahala suluhedi . Weyahina sisanapuya 'idi sabwelo madouna 'ihohoya , 'oinega geya nuwadi ma 'abehega loheloheyaedi 'adi kelose 'oidiya sisanasanana 'idi Sabatinaina 'oina .

Pailatoina Yesu 'ina gwae gidemusa 'ihesagoha 'eseya , 'oinega nuwanuwana madouna Yesu 'ilihasi . Ma hesiyage meYudiyaedi geya nuwadi , 'oinega mabwaiyadi 'enadi madounega sigwaeya , “ Yesu 'eguma 'ulihasi , 'owa geya Sisa 'iyana . Weyahina loheya beno 'i'abowa 'abehega tauna kini 'aigeda , ma hesiyage Sisa 'iboinamo kini . Coinega tasanapuya 'abehega tauna Sisa 'ana 'aleha . ”
Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya , 'igwae , “ Sahena nuwami sihehelahalaha , ma hesi Yehoba wahemisae ma wete taugu wahemisaegau .
ma geya'abwa wete wamatamatauta 'ami 'alehao 'oidiya . Ma 'eguma 'ami 'alehaowedi 'imi 'atepatu si'ita , beno taudi sisanapu moisa 'abehega sida hesilae , ma 'omi 'abihetena waloba Yehoba 'oinega .

“ Comi geya wahesinuwegau ma 'oimiya yahe'inapwana . Taugu hesiyage yahesinuwanegomiya ma 'abehega yahesumanegomi , wapaihowa , ma 'imi paihowaedi 'oidiyega huwaimi bwebwe'adi silatu , ma wete 'oimiya simiya hataya . Ma 'oinega to'aha nuwanuwami , ma saniguwega wa'ahwanoi , nata wete Tamagu 'i'ebwaegomi .

Coinega Ebeli wete ma'ina hemisa 'ipwaoli Yehoba 'oina , 'oinega 'ina pwaoliina Keni 'ina pwaoli 'ibwebwe'ana sineya , ta Yehoba 'iyaliyaya Ebeli 'ina pwaoli weyahina ta 'i'ahwa dumwaluweya . Ebeliina bale'u 'i'ebesine pwaiya , ma hesi 'ina hemisega 'oida 'ihehe'ita .
Sowasowana ma wasanapumai 'abehega tauma Keliso 'ina topaihowao , weyahina tetelaina Yehoba 'oinega mwalo dahwadahwaina ma bewa tuwa 'ahehepwaile 'oimiya .
Ma 'ipwala sibe'uma galewega , gide 'ane 'aiwe 'ihuwa ta yaumai waiwaina 'itowama ta huwanaedi sigubagubala .
Ciyagwao nuwanuwagu madouna ma hali 'ebe hemisao waguipailedi .
Eeta sahena pui watagwatagwale ma 'oimiya 'ihewaiwai , ma 'omi hesiyage wahewaiwai sine mumuga bwebwe'ana 'oinega .

Coinega Yehoba matana 'ino tomotaiyao 'ulohatotodi ma 'uhenuwa lagudi ma gwae bewa sahena sinuwanuwanaide , ma wete sahena gwae tupwadi 'adi bui weyahidi sihe'ahwa panapanawa . Weyahina he'ahwa panapanawa besobeso beno taudi tohesagoha 'oidiya nata geya 'i'abi'abihetedi , ma hesi 'i'abihe galadi .
Ta wanao Yehoba deina ma 'oinega tauna wete 'inaowa deimiya . Ta 'omi galami ma to'abo 'ilobwaineya ma nimami wadeulidi ma 'atemi wagihe'ehaudi .
Ma 'eguma tupwadi tomota wahe'ahe'asisiyanedi ma tupwadi tomota geya , beno loinaina wadi'wadi'wai , ma waboimimo 'imi mumuga wa'abi'abi hegaladi .
Weyahina Yehoba 'ihesinuwegita geya mumuga galana weyahina , ma hesi mumuga 'ehauna weyahina .
Yehoba wetenuge 'ina gamwasowala 'ihe'itaeyama galewega taudi mumugadi galadi mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , weyahina 'idi mumuga galana 'oinega mumuga dumwaluna sihegagaleya .
Ciyagwao , sowasowana mabwaiyada tahelau hilegita , weyahina Yehoba helau huhuna , 'oinega tohelauwao taudi Yehoba 'ihenatunediya , ma taudi Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao .
Ceguma taiya tasina 'ilo'alehe ma 'igwaegwae 'abehega tauna 'asilala 'oina 'imiyamiya , beno 'i'abo'abo , weyahina tauna 'abwa tuwa guguyou 'oina 'imiyamiya .
Ma 'eguma tomota si'ahwa galagalaegomi 'imi hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina , wayaliyaya tuwa , weyahina Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'asi'asilalaina 'oimiya 'imiyamiya .
Ma Paulo 'igwae helauwediya , ta 'ina guguya ma Yehoba 'ina paihowa tomiya ganamuli 'alodiya weyahina 'ihe'ote'otetela bwaibwaina 'oidiya .

“ Ma togidega ? Sowasowahimi ma 'eta taiya 'oimiyega 'igu 'eda galadi 'ihepwailedi ? Nuwana geya sowasowahimi , 'awa ? Coinega 'eguma gwae moisa 'oidiyega yahehegwaegwae , to'aha weyahina geya wada hemisaegauwa ?
Ta wete 'igwaeya , “ Cidi galao ma 'idi puiyao yanuwanaidedi . ”
Ciyagwao , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina helauwega ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya , ma 'omi mahetegwao Yehoba 'oina ta'ahwanoi waiwai ,
Coinega bodaedi Yesu sihegwae hileya , “ Yaluyaluwa bi'i debau 'i'abi heyauyauleya 'oinega beno gide 'ugwaegwae 'esa ? Taiya hede nuwanuwana ma 'abehega 'ilohe'amasigo ? ”

Moisa tuwa , Yehoba natuna 'itagwaleya ma 'abehega 'ina 'amasega 'itoehilegita Yehoba 'oina , ma mahetedai tahe'iya'iyagu , beno 'eguma Yesu tahemisae . Bewa 'oinega Yehoba mumugana bwebwe'ana 'ihe'itegita , weyahina mwalo heneyage mumugada galana geya 'ida hemaisediya , ma tuwa 'i'alama'i'itana 'ana siga Yesu Keliso 'ihewasaeyama , 'isuluma 'oida .

Ma sauga nage 'oina gogagogai 'ana tuta , 'oinega topaihowa ma tolo'alehaedi 'aiwe sihataliya ma 'oina simwaimwailu . Coinega Pitaina 'i'itediya simwaimwailu , ta wete tauna 'iluhuwa 'oidiya , ma mahetenao simwaimwailu .
ma Yehoba 'ina tobwatobwa 'aleha mabwaiyana 'oidiyega wa'otena , ma 'oinega geya'abwa wawe'awe'a tutaina 'eguma Tomudulele 'i'abowegomi .
Ma Pita Yesu wete 'enana 'ihemaiseya , 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , to'aha weyahina sauga bewa 'oina geya'abwa yamulimuliyego ? Hesi 'uda sanapu yatagwalegauwa ma weyahiu ya'amasa . ”
ma Yehoba 'ina lemao tomadou hedada 'oidiyega 'abwa 'igihe yaliyayegomi , ma 'oinega Yesu Keliso mahetemiu 'atemi ta 'imi nuwatuhuwao sibwebwe'ana .
Weteyage 'ahwadega Tamada Yehoba tahehepwatuwe , ta wete 'ahwadega 'iyadao ta'ahwa galagalaedi , taudi Yehoba 'ipaihowediya tauna 'ana 'ita gidemusa ,

ma hesi geya yaloiloina 'abehega tologwaliyedi ma tobwatobwa 'ana tohamwao ma toyagahao ma tolonabwasuwao walogwahatedi , weyahina bale'u bewa 'oina taudi gidemusa baibaiwa hedade , geya sawasawahida ta'ebesinedi .
“ Moisa , taugu mwalo 'igu nuwatuhu 'abehega 'eda mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega , Yesu gwama Nasaleta sanina ya'ausi .

Ma 'idi pui 'ebedeba mwadina 'oinega sihemata ganawala , ma 'idi pui hilahila weyahina geya tani'odi 'ida towa . Ma towe'a sihanuhanugetedi 'eda galana 'oina , ma tobwatobwa 'ana nuwa'ewa 'oidiya 'imadou hedada . Ma Yehoba 'abwa 'ihemaisa 'idi mumuga galana weyahina .

Ma hesiyage taiya 'eguma geya sipi 'adi to'itayahina moisa ma maisamo weyahina 'ipaipaihowa , tutaina 'eguma 'edewa sasasasaina 'i'ita 'itautauyama , nata sipiyedi 'i'ebesinedi ma 'idena . Cabwa hesi 'edewaina sasasasaina 'inaoma ma sipi tupwadi 'ilohe'amasidi ma mabwaiyadi 'ipa'i lelewanedi .
Tasigwao , 'ilobwainegomiya ma gwae wahesagohe bwaibwaini , ma sahena gwaehila ma gamwasowala 'oidiyega wahehewaiwai .
Yehoba 'ina loina bewa gide 'abehega Yesu Keliso tetelina 'ana tohepwailao 'adiwa sida lobadi 'idi paihowao 'oidiyega .
Taugu bewa maedanaina yatauyama bale'uwa ma 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wahemisaegau , nata geya'abwa guguyou 'oina watautauya .

Muliyetega Yesu loheyaina 'ilobeya Yehoba 'ina hada solana , ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Bewa tuwa 'ubwebwe'ana pwaiya , 'oinega sahena wete 'upuipui hila , nata gide ginaula gala hedadedi 'oiuwa silatu . ”
ta wete 'imi paihowa mabwaiyana 'oidiya wahehelau hilegomi .
Coinega Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Ceguma moisa wahelauwegauwa , 'igu loinao mabwaiyadi wahematamatanedi .

Coinega wa'ita yahigomi ma tauna galewega 'igwaegwae 'oida sahena 'enana walologwahate . Weyahina mwalo tomota tupwadi bale'uwa Mosese 'ina lohatoto 'oidiya silogwahateya , ta mwau silobeya . Ma bewa sauga Yehoba galewega 'ilologuguya 'oida , ta 'eguma 'enana talogwahate mwau madou hedade taloba .
Comi mwalo Yehoba geya wasanapu , ta 'imi 'ebe hemisao taudi gidemusa Yehoba 'abo'abodi .
Ma Yehoba 'ina hewali Yesu 'i'abihe toholoya , ta 'omi meYudiya 'oimiya 'ihetune nugeteyama , ma 'ina helau 'oimiya beno 'abehega 'imi puiyao 'oidiyega wanuwabui , ma hali bodao muliyetega . ”
Ma tauma Yesu 'ana tohepwailao , weyahina 'ina paihowa 'a'itediya Yudiya tupwanao mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , ma wete Yelusalema 'oina , ta 'ana 'ebelolagu 'aiwe 'oina situtu hepa'ineya ma 'i'amasa ,
Tasigwao , bewa 'igu lohatoto 'oimiya 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega ma 'abehega wanuwatuhu hegogona ma wagwae hegogona , ma hesi sahena wahehe'ohe'ohe nuwana wawatawatahigomi .
Comi wete mwalo wamiya wasiwasiya , ta 'imi nuwatuhuwega Yehoba walo'aleheya , 'oinega wamumuga galagala .
Coinega hewahewali 'idi henuhenuwa 'ulogwahatedi ma mumuga dumwaluna ta hemisa ta helau ta miya daumwala 'umuliyedi , taudi Yesu si'ahwa badaeya ma'ate 'ehaudi ba'idamwao .
Yehoba Keliso ba'idamiu 'ihetoholo hilegomiya , 'oinega galewa ginaulaedi wa'ebesedi , nobwa Kelisoina Yehoba 'ina 'ebeulega galewa 'imiyamiya .

Ma 'aigeda 'ina yoguli 'imu'eya , ta dohi 'ana 'ita hagana 'isuluwa , 'ana 'ita 'aisi pwa'upwa'uwana gide , ta wete 'aiwe 'ala'alasina ma bweyaha ba'idana sigubagubalama bale'uwa , ta 'i'alasiya . Ceguma bale'u mabwaiyana 'ana wataha 'etoi , 'aigeda tupwa 'i'alasi ta 'eluwa tupwa geya . Ma tupwaina 'i'alasiya 'oina , 'aiwe ma 'awata mabwaiyadi 'i'ala hegumwalidiya .
“ Cima Bada Yehoba Tohewaiwai hedade , 'owa tuta bewa , ma tuta mwalo 'oidiya 'umiyamiya , 'aloyauwedo 'oiuwa , weyahina 'ino waiwai madouna 'u'abi helatuweya , 'oinega 'uhegaina ma 'uloina .

Coinega Yesu Sameliya wahineina 'ihegwaehileya , “ Yehoba 'eguma 'ina helau 'oiuwa 'usanasanapu , ma wete 'eguma 'usanapugauwa taiya taugu 'oiuwa we'aha weyahina ya'ahwa'awanoi , 'owa hesi 'ilobwainegowa 'oiguwa 'uda 'ahwanoi ma we'aha yawasiu weyahina ya'ebwaego . ”
Weyahina yawasida bwebwe'ana Keliso 'oinega ta'eweya , 'oinega 'abwa tutaina Keliso 'ilatuma , 'omi wete Keliso ba'idamiu walatu 'ina 'asilala wasawasa 'oina .

Ma hesiyage hisadimo tuwa bewa yalelediya ma 'oinega wahasilidi ma Yesu wasanapu ma wahemisae 'abehega tauna moisa To'abihetena Yehoba natuna . Ma 'oinega Yesu saninega yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba .

Ma tauda hesi Yehoba 'oinega tali'uma , 'oinega 'eguma taiyawedi Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao , 'enada sihesagoheya , ma taudi geya Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao , 'enada geya'abwa sihehesagohe . Coinega tasanapu 'abehega yaluyaluwa 'abo'abo 'oidiya 'imiyamiya , weyahina 'eguma Yaluyaluwa moisa 'oidiya beno 'enada sihesagohe .

Ceguma tapwalolo 'oina helau 'e'ahaina wapaipaihowa ma 'eguma togalaidi siluguwa , 'e'ahaiina si'abihegala , weyahina si'ai hedahedada ma geya sida deba mwadina . Nuwanuwadi taudimo siyaliyaya , 'adi 'ita gide yaloha dubana yaumai 'ipeineya ma geya dohi . Wete 'adi 'ita gide 'aiwe , 'ina sauga huwa ma geya huwainamo , 'oinega sigoha yahule ma 'i'amasa moisa .
Ma wete tolohalao sitoedima ma'ebe'enoidi ma silagudiya Pita 'ina 'ebetauyao 'oidiya , ma 'abehega Pita loguloguna 'ida 'abihe bwebwe'anedi .
Ma wete 'imi hemisa gide 'imi lobodaboda 'oinega wa'ausigomi , beno sawasawahina Tomudulele 'ina 'aliliya waiwaidi 'ihabodebodedi .
Ta 'imi paihowa mabwaiyana 'oidiyega wagwahubiga , geya 'abehega tomota weyahidi , ma hesi Yehoba weyahina .
Sahena wanuwanuwa 'ubuna , ta wete sahena Yehoba 'ina helau walologwahate , gide Iso mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwaehemisa tauna weyahina ma 'ipeleya tasina 'oina , 'ana maisa 'e'ahai 'aigeda tuwamo .
Coinega bodaedi mabwaiyadi si'apu lagata ma 'enadi madounega sigwaeya , “ Geya , tauna sahena 'ulihalihasi , nuwanuwama Balabasa hesi 'ulihasi weyahima . ” ( Balabasaina tauna toyagaha . )
to'wayama , ma galana 'oina sihewaiwai , ma gwae hane hedada , ma geya Yehoba sihelauwe , ta hesi taudimo 'idi yaliyaya weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu .
Coinega Yehoba Yesu 'i'abihaneheya , ma wete sanina 'i'abihaneheya sani mabwaiyana tabwanidiya ,
Mwalo 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina waiwai ma 'ina tauyama 'ahepwailediya 'oimiya , ma 'ima hepwailaina geya tosonosonogao 'idi 'ote'otetelao 'oidiyega , ma hesi matamega tauna 'ina wasawasa 'a'iteya .

Eeta nuwatuhuina weyahina 'ihepwaila 'ina lele nugenugetadi mabwaiyadi 'oidiya . Ma tupwana nuwatuhuwao 'ina letao 'alodiya 'adi sanapu mwauna , 'oinega tohenainaidao ma towe'ao nuwatuhuwedi sigibuidiya , ta Buki He'asisi 'ina leleyao wete sigibuidiya ma si'abo , 'oinega siboidimo sigihe galediya .
Ta siteluwaedi topwaoliina 'ina nuwatuhu sisanapuya ma geya nuwadi . Coinega 'adi 'ale'o siboi sigisabuya ma sipili latuma , boda 'oidiya sigwaegwae ,
Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Keliso wete meYudiya 'oidiya 'ihetopaihowa , 'abehega Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaedi babada nugenugetadi 'oidiya 'igwaeneya , 'adi moisa 'ida latu ,
Ma 'eguma 'aigeda loheya 'inuwa hanehane ta 'abehega tauna totapwalolo moisa , ma geya 'ina gwae 'ida 'itayahiya , tauna tuwa 'iboimo 'i'aboweya , nata 'ina tapwaloloina ginaula besobeso .

“ Gwaeyedi ya'ebwaegomiya wanuwatuhuyahi pa'alidi , tutaina yagwaeya 'abehega geya 'eta topaihowa sowasowahina ma 'ina 'inapwana 'ihanesine . Weyahina taugu mwalona gide silo'alehegauwa , 'oinega 'omi nata wete gide silo'alehegemi . Ma 'eguma mwalona 'igu gwae sida muliyaediya , 'omi wete gide 'imi gwae nata simuliya .
Coinega meYudiyaedi taudi Yesu sihemisaeya , 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cigu he'ita 'eguma wamuliyedi , 'omi moisa 'agu tomuliyao .
“ Ma muliyetega gomale madouna 'ilatuwa Itipita mabwaiyana ma 'asa Kenani 'oidiya , ma miya mwauna moisa 'ihapwesa , ma tubudaowedi geya 'adimo .
Mwalo natumwao tupwadi ya'itediya 'eda dumwadumwaluna simuliyeya , gide 'ada loina Tamada 'oinega , 'oinega yayaliyaya madouna .
Ma 'eguma taiya 'ina susuwao bo natunao geya 'ida 'itayahidiya , beno tauna Yehoba 'ina he'ita 'ilogwahateya , ma tauna togala hedada 'abwa taudi Yehoba 'ana touhalao .

Coinega Yehoba tahahoho ma'ida 'atetagwala ta ma'ida hemisa moisa , ma 'oinega wahida ta'abihe'ehaudi we'aha 'ausalana 'oinega , ma wete 'ida nuwatuhu si'ehau , weyahina Yesu 'ina losehusehula 'oinega 'ida nuwatuhu galadi 'i'abihe 'ehaudiya .
Beno tuwa teteligu sihesagoheya 'abehega “ Tauna mwalo 'igihegihe muyegita , ma 'inuwabui pwaiya , ta tetelina mwalo 'i'etobodeya tuta bewa 'iloguguyaeya . ”
Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma talohepa'ala , weyahina sahena hesi 'aigeda 'ihehesilae . ”
Ma wete 'alama'i'ita sanigu weyahina wasanapuya , eeta paihowa mwaudi ta madoudi 'oidiyega geya wada we'a .
Ma babadaedi 'uhegwaedi sahena sinumanuma yauyaule we'aha galana , ma sahena wete siyaliyaliyaya besobeso , ma hesi Yehoba sihemisa moisa , ma helau ta 'alama'i'ita 'oidiyega simaha .
“ Tutaina mwalo tomota Yehoba sihemwage mwageyeya , 'oinega geya 'ida gamwasowalediya , ma hesi bewa tuwa tauda tomota tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'iloinaegita ma 'ida pui 'oidiyega tanuwabui .
Ma Yesuina 'ana kelose deina wahiwahine sitehata sitotoholo , taudi beno Yesu sinana matasina , ma wete hali Meli tauna Kilopa mwanena , ma wete Meli Magidala .
Ma 'ana 'ale'oina 'i'oteya bweyaha 'oinega 'ihebuteya , ta sanina silaguya , sigwae , “ Yehoba 'ina gwae . ”
Coinega 'e'ahai mabwaiyana sawasawahina ta'aidi , ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi ma sahena 'ami he'ahe'asisiina wa'ai'ai tohekalesiyao we'awe'aidi matadiya , ma 'oinega wa'abi'abi hebe'udi .

“ Ma wete 'i'abihe toholo hileya ma sahena 'i'ama'amasa hila , nuwana 'imwahumwahulu , ma bewa weyahina 'ihepwaila nugeteya , 'igwae , 'Ginaulaedi bwebwe'adi yagwae hemisediya Debida 'oina , 'abwa ya'ebwaego . ’
“ Sabwelo nage nata 'oina 'abwa hesi wasanapugau 'abehega taugu Tamagu 'oina yamiyamiya , ma 'omi wete 'oiguwa wamiyamiya , ma taugu wete 'oimiya yamiyamiya .
Yehobaina tasanapuya 'abehega 'iyadai moisa , 'eguma 'ina loinao tahematamatanedi .
Beno huhuna 'oinega yahegwaegomiya 'abehega 'imi pui nata 'oidiyega wa'amasa , 'eguma geya wahemisaegau taugu . ”
Ma wahineina ya'iteya , Yehoba 'ina topaihowao ma Yesu 'ana tohepwailao 'idi 'amasega bweyahidi 'inumediya ma 'oinega 'ihebuwa , ta yahenainaida wahineina 'ana 'ita weyahina .
Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tuta muliyetega Iso gwae hemisaina 'inuweya , ta weyahina 'idouwa , ta geya sawasawahina 'i'ewahila , weyahina tasina 'i'ewa pwaiya .

Tomota baibaiwadi siboidimo 'oidiya sihehe'ahwa henahena Yesu weyahina . Tupwadi tomota sigwae , “ Tauna loheya bwebwe'ana . ” Ma tupwadi tomota sigwae , “ Tauna wete to'e'abo'abo 'aigeda , tomota 'i'waya'wayamidi . ”
ma Badaina 'i'abihe waiwaiyediya ma tomota tupwana baibaiwana 'idi gwae sihemisaeya ma sitehinowa Badaina 'oina .

Weyahina 'ima paihowa bewa Yehoba 'itagwala 'oima ma tetela bwebwe'ana 'ahepwaila latuweya , 'oinega 'ima hepwailaedi beno geya to'aha tomota nuwanuwadi , ma hesi to'aha Yehoba nuwanuwana . Eeta nuwatuhuwedi 'atema simiyamiya , bwebwe'adi bo galadi , Yehoba 'iboimo 'isanasanapu .
Ma hesi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'i'abihetegita ma galanaina 'oinega tahewaiwaisine , eeta Yehoba 'oina taloyauwedo madouna .
Ma taudi hiwahiwapeyedi geya 'idi susumo 'ulemedi , 'eguma Yehoba taunamo sihemiseya ma 'oina si'ahwa'ahwanoi sabwelo ma nihuwana 'oidiya .
Comi mwalo ta bewa 'oina saniguwega geya 'eta to'aha weyahina wada 'ahwanoiya . Coinega bewa tuwa 'eguma 'eta to'aha nuwanuwami , wa'ahwanoi ma 'i'ebwaegomi , ma 'oinega wayaliyaya moisa . ”

Ceguma taiya 'owa 'aigeda loheya madouna weyahina 'upaipaihowa tutaina 'uhekalesiya , sahena 'unuwanuwagala 'ino paihowaina weyahina , ma hesi 'eguma 'ino taubadaina 'abwa 'itagwalego ma 'uhila 'ino 'asa , bwebwe'ana tuwa 'uhila .
Togalaedi mumuga bale'u simulimuliye , 'oinega tohekalesiyao 'adi towatahao , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna geya 'oidiya .

Cebe nuwahenainaida bewa 'oiguwa , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ihesinuwegomiya ma 'abehega helau Keliso 'oinega waloba , 'oinega tetelinaina wahemisaeya , ma hesi walomwayamwayauwa bewa tuwa ta walogwahateya , ta hali tetela wahemisaeya .
Watoho waiwai ma wamiya daumwala tomota ba'idamiyao , ta wete watoho ma 'imi mumuga 'ibwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , weyahina 'eguma taiya geya 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana geya'abwa Bada 'i'ita'ita .

Ma wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cimi gomanina wa'abi ma 'ateyaniyega wayahuwe ma silahana wa'onadi . ” Coinega 'idi gomanaina si'abiya ma 'ateyaniyega siyahuweya , ma silahana baibaiwadi si'onediya , ma gomana 'abina sigagadeya .
weyahina 'upwaina geya ginaula madouna , ta ginaula madouna hesi Yehoba 'ina loina 'adi hematamatana .

Eema 'eguma taiya tuta baibaiwana 'iyanao 'i'abi'abi hewaiwaiyedi , ee 'ipaihowa gidemusa . Ma taiya wete tuta baibaiwana 'i'ehe'ehele , beno ma'ina 'atetagwala 'i'ehele . Ma 'eguma taiya 'ihetohanugeta , 'ida paihowa bwaibwaina . Ma 'eguma taiya ma'ina 'atemuyamuya , ee 'iyanao 'i'abi'abihetedi ma'ina yaliyaya .

ma 'ihesilalediya 'igwae , “ Ciyagwao , tutaina Yesu wahemisaeya Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina waiwai walotohoya bo geya ? ” Ma sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Geya . Geya 'asanapu 'abehega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'imiyamiya . ”
Ceguma taiya he'itaedi 'imi leta bewa 'alonega 'isinalidi , loheyaina wa'ebesine , ma 'oinega 'ina paihowaina 'oina debana 'imwadina ,
Ciyagwao wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega wahida bale'uwa 'imwahumwahulu gesowana 'iluhu galewa , weyahina wahi bale'uwa mwahuluna , ta wahi galewa geya 'ida mwahuluwa .

Coinega bewa tuwa yahegwaegomi , sahena 'e'ahai gumwagumwalidi weyahidi wapaipaihowa , ma hesi 'e'ahai yawasimi miyamiya hatayana weyahidi wapaihowa . Ce'ahainaina bewa weyahina yahehegwaegwae . Loheyaiguina taugu nata ya'ebwaegomi . Weyahina Tamagu 'ina paihowa bewa weyahina 'ihesumanegauma ma yapaihowadi . ”
Ma 'eguma weyahidi wa'ahwanoi , geya wada lobediya , beno weyahina 'imi 'ahwanoi geya dumwaludi , weyahina 'imi 'ahwanoiyedi waboimo 'imi yaliyaya weyahina .
ma tuta mabwaiyana waloyauwedo ginaula mabwaiyadi weyahidi , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega , Tamada Yehoba 'oina .
Wanuwatuhuyahi Ebalahamo 'abehega tauna Yehoba 'ihemisaeya , 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya ,
Sinala ma wai'ena geya sida saehaneya 'asaina 'oina , weyahina Yehoba 'ina wasawasega 'i'atuhe 'asilaleya mabwaiyana , ma wete Lami 'ihemayaleya 'asaina 'oina .

Ma 'omi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'iloiloinegomi , ta 'oimiya wete 'imiyamiya , eeta waboi 'imi nuwatuhu geya 'ida loinegomiya . Weyahina 'eguma taiya Keliso Yaluyaluwana geya 'oina , tauna geya Keliso 'ina boda .
Ta 'eguma meYudiyaedi sinuwabui ma sihemisa hila , nata wete Yehoba 'oina 'ilaguhepa'i hiladi , weyahina Yehoba sowasowahina ma gide 'ipaihowa 'esa .
Taudi geya 'eta 'abo 'oidiya , ta geya wete 'idi puimo .

“ Ta 'idi gwae 'aigeda tuwa ya'ahwa moisaeya , beno 'edaina sihesaniyeya Wataha 'oinega yalotapwalolo tubumao 'idi Yehoba 'oina . Ma wete Mosese 'ina loinao ma palopitao 'idi lele mabwaiyadi yahemisaediya .

Cami buki wahemaisa hegumwalidi , eema 'ane buki 'aigeda tuwa weyahina wanuwanuwatuhu beno helau , tauna geya sawasawahida tahemaisa hegumwali , weyahina 'eguma 'iyadao tahelauwedi beno loina mabwaiyadi tapaihowediya ,
Ma yahiyahiina madouna tomota 'i'ala'alasidi , 'oinega Yehoba siheliyeya , weyahina tauna 'ina loinega ma mwauwedi silatuma . Ma tuwa geya sida nuwabuiya ta 'abehega Yehoba sihepwatuwe .

Ma 'asaina 'ana 'ali madouna ma saliyana , ma 'ana 'ahwa'eda 'adi baibaiwa tuwelo , ta 'ahwa'edaedi 'adi to'itayahinao anelose tuwelo , ta wete 'ahwa'edaedi 'oidiya susu tuwelowedi Isileli 'oinega sanidiyao silelediya .

Ta geya sawasawahina loina mabwaiyana tahematamatanedi , 'oinega Kelisoina 'ihemiyalaenegita ta 'i'abihetegita loina 'ana mwau 'oinega . Loina 'ana mwau bewa , 'eguma geya tada hematamatanediya ta'amasa , 'oinega Keliso tauda weyahida 'i'amasa gidemusa taudi togala madoudi 'adi lohe'amasa kelose 'oidiya . Buki He'asisi mwalo 'ina gwae bewa weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiyawedi kelose 'oidiya silagudi ma si'amasa , to'amasaedi 'ahwa galagala siloba Yehoba 'oinega . ” Eeta Keliso tauda weyahida mwauina 'ilobeya .
Ta 'igu mumuga mwalo , tutaina meYudiya 'idi boda 'alona yamiyamiya , wahesagoheya , 'abehega Yehoba 'ina tohekalesiyao ya'abihemuya hedadediya ta nuwanuwagu yamutudi .

Nuwanuwagu wete Keliso yada sanapu ma 'ina toholohila 'ana waiwai yalotoho , ta 'ina muya wete tauna gidemusa yada lotohodi , wete gide 'igu 'amasa gide tauna ,

Ceguma taiya 'ina gumalaulau 'itagwale ma 'ihai , beno bwebwe'ana , ta 'eguma 'i'etobode beno wete bwebwe'ana hedada .
Geya'abwa wahesagohamo , beno tuwa wa'abo'abowegomi , ma wapaihowa wete .
Muliyetega Yesu Galili 'ina 'ebe loina mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'itauya , ma hesiyage geya nuwana Yudiya 'ina 'ebe loina 'oidiya 'itauya . Weyahina meYudiya 'idi 'inapwanaedi nuwanuwadi Yesu silohe'amasi .

Muliyetega gaeba 'oina we'aha 'isiweya , ma 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ahedi 'ibuyodiya , 'abwa muliyetega taweloina 'oinega 'ahediyedi 'isaudiya .
“ Ma hemisa hauhauna bewa 'ana tomuliyao yalo'alehediya . Ma loheloheya ma wahiwahine deliya yalagu luhuwediya , ta tupwadi yalohe'amasidiya .
Bewa 'oinega , tomota 'oidiya miya wasiwasi 'ilatuwa .

Camasaina 'ina waiwai 'ilatuwa mumuga galana 'oinega , eeta mumuga galagala 'ina waiwai beno Mosese 'ina loinao 'adi ligeha 'oidiyega .
Ma 'imi tanoha 'adi topaihowao geya wahemaisa bwaibwainidi , 'oinega topaihowaedi 'idi lomugi ta 'idi dou Yehoba Tohewaiwai tauna 'ihesagoheya .
Eeta 'imi galao ma 'imi 'e'abo'abowao gwaeyega bo paihowega ma 'imi he'ipi'ipiyao ma 'imi 'ahwa galagalao waguipailedi ,

Ma 'eguma taiya wahine haihainina mwanena ba'idana sihe'aigeda pwaiya ta 'eguma loheya 'i'amasa , wahineina sawasawahina ma 'ihai hila . Ta hesi 'ilobwaineya Yehoba 'ina loheya 'aigeda mahetena sihai .
ma siteluwaedi he'ita moisaina si'ebesineya ma sigwae , “ To'amasa 'idi toholo hila 'ana tuta 'igumwala , ” 'oinega 'iyadiyao tupwadi 'idi 'aboina sihesagoheya , ta 'idi hemisa 'iwe'a .

Moisa , Yesu Keliso 'oina meYudiya 'adi 'ila'ilala geya 'i'abihe dumwaluwegita , beno 'wapidi si'upwa'upwa , ma wete 'eguma 'wapi 'upwaina talogwahate geya'abwa 'ada 'ahwadumwalu talobaloba . Beno tuwa 'eguma Yesu tahemise ma tahelauwe , tauna 'ada to'abihedumwalu .
ta 'oinega 'ina mumuga mabwaiyana dumwaluna . Tauda wete 'eguma tahematamatane 'abihetena hataya Yesuina 'oinega taloba ,

Comi wahiwahine haihainimi mwanemiyao 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi , gidemusa 'imi hematamatana Keliso 'oina ,

Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Taugu gogo gabulena 'ana 'asilala . Ma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wamuliyegau , nata taugu 'asilalaina yawasimi 'oidiya yasae hane , ma 'oinega geya'abwa guguyou 'oina watautauya . ”

Ciyagwao , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwailao 'idi gwae hemisa wanuwatuhuyahi tutaina mwalo sigwaeya , sigwae , “ Tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oina tupwadi tomota nata mumuga dumwadumwaluna silotuyane , weyahina taudi 'adi lotohona galana 'iloiloinedi . ”

Ma tomota tauda geya sowasowahida ma 'aigeda to'aha nimadega tauna Yehobaina ta'ebwae , 'eguma tanuwatuhu 'abehega nuwanuwana , ta tauna hesi yawasida ma yaluyaluwada ma 'ida tobwatobwa mabwaiyana 'i'ebwaegita .
Ceguma tomota 'idi hepwailao tahemisaedi , sawasawahina ma Yehobaina 'ina hepwaila tahemise , weyahina Yehoba tauna Tohewaiwai , ta Natuna weyahina 'ihepwaila pwaiya 'oida .
Sahena bale'u mumugana weyahina tanuwanuwatuhu , ma hesiyage 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso mumuganega tatauya .
Ma wete tutaina taudi 'asa Yeliko sisakowasiyeya mabwaiyadi sabwelo sebeni 'oidiya , 'idi hemisa weyahina 'asaina 'ana 'ali madouna 'ibe'uwa ,
Ta Yehoba hedehedede hagadi 'i'abi latuhediya Paulo 'ina paihowega ,

Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taiyawedi 'eguma 'idi paihowa galadi , taudi beno bodaedi geya lihasa 'oina simiyamiya . Weyahina ginaula galadi 'ina waiwai 'oinega 'ipaidiya .
Bewa 'oinega Yehoba 'ina helau 'imadou hedadeya . Ciyagwao , 'ilobwainegita ma tauda wete tada helau hilegita .
Ta hesi yawasi bwebwe'ana 'ina 'eda 'uhe'itaeya 'oiguwa , 'oinega matauwa 'u'abihe yaliyaya hataegau . ’ ”
Ma wete tapwalolo 'alona Buki Tabu 'uhasili , ma 'uguguya , ma 'uhe'ita 'ana siga yatauyawa .
Tomota 'ama mwau baibaiwadi si'ebwaemaiya ta hesi geya sowasowadi ma si'abihe galemai , 'oinega 'ima nuwatuhu baibaiwana ta geya 'abe'u .
Ma hesi 'iyadiyao tupwadi sigwae , “ Nuwana we'aha waiwai 'oinega sihebuwa . ”
Casaina 'ana 'ali dimwa wasawasa ma namanamalidi 'oidiyega si'abiya , ta 'asa 'alona goula 'oinega si'abiya , ta 'inamanamala gide tuwa gelasi .
Ma Hada He'asisiina 'oinega anelose sebeni silatuma ta muyamuya sebeni nimadiya . Aneloseyedi 'adi 'ale'o wa'ewa'e'edi ta 'ausaladi , ma 'adi gadiwana goula lumalumadiya simiyamiya .
Ma 'eguma taiyawedi siguipailegomi geya sowana waheheliyedi , ma hesi wagwae helau 'oidiya .
Ma 'ahena gide tuwa pwawati 'ehauna sigabudiya sinamanamala , ma 'enana 'ana hesagoha gide tuwa we'aha madoudi sidaudau ,

Coinega mumugau yahe'ita pwaiyeya 'oidiya , ma 'abwa nata wete yahe'ite hiladi , ma 'oinega 'ino helauina 'ateguwa 'imiyamiya taudi 'atediya wete gidemusa 'ida miyamiya , ma taugu wete 'oidiya yada miyamiya . ”
Weyahina Yehoba natuna moisa geya 'ida nuwahiya , ma hesiyage 'itagwaleya weyahida , 'abwa ginaula mabwaiyadi wete 'i'ebwaegita .
Ma hesiyage 'ina helauina sahena weyahina wagwaegwae hanehane , weyahina laha geya sowasowahina lamu 'iloinae , ma lamu hesiyage sawasawahina laha 'iloinaedi .
Geya 'abehega 'ahetoloina pa'alina 'oimiya 'imi hemisa ta 'imi tapwalolo weyahidi , weyahina 'imi hemisega watoholo pa'ala pwaiya , ma hesi sabi lemegomi 'imi yaliyaya weyahina .
Loheya 'aigeda lolohalaina sanina Lasalo , Bedani loheyaina . Loheyainaina nuhunao siteluwa mahetenao simiyamiya , 'aigeda sanina Meli ma 'aigeda sanina Malida .

Ma hesi 'eguma taiya loinaina 'iligehi , geya 'abehega tomota 'idi loina , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina loina 'iligeligehi , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna tauna nuwatuhu 'ana to'abihe'ehau , beno Yehoba 'ina 'ehele 'oida .
Ma hesi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana wada sanapu weyahina 'eguma Yesu Keliso ta'ahwa moisae 'abehega 'iheloheya bale'uwa , 'ida gwaeyedi beno Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega .

Ma togalaedi silugu pwaiya 'oimiya , 'idi mumuga mahemahetena , weyahina taudi 'idi nihiyao 'oidiyega siloina galana , eeta 'idi galao 'etoi sipaipaihowadi , 'aigeda wahidi sigihe bailidi , heluwena toloinao bwebwe'adi silogwahatediya , ma hetoina tomiya galewa bwebwe'adi si'ahwa galagalaedi .
Wete paihowa galadi 'ilogwahatedi ma 'ipaihowa bwebwe'ana hali tomota 'oidiya , ma wete 'ihetapewa waiwai nuwadaumwala weyahina .

Beno 'eguma 'imi hemisa sahena 'iwe'awe'a , ma 'eguma watoholo pa'ala wasaina bwebwe'anaina wahesagoheya 'ana hemisa 'oina , ma sahena wa'ebe'ebesine . Wasaina 'ana lohatoto tomota mabwaiyadi bale'uwa sihesagoha pwaiya , ma taugu Paulo 'ana tohepwaila 'aigeda .
Coinega meYudiyaedi da'ule si'ewediya ma 'abehega si'ahu yamate , ma Yesu 'oidiyega 'iha'waiha ma Hada He'asisi 'oinega 'ilatuwa ma 'itauya .
ma 'oinega mumuga hauhauna wa'ewa Yehoba 'ina mumuga gide , weyahina tauna 'ateda mumuga bwebwe'ana ma 'ehauna 'ilaguya .
Gwae bewa 'oinega Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao 'abwa si'alama'i'ita , taudi 'ina loina 'ana tohematamatanao ta Yesu 'ana tohemisao .
Ma Yehoba 'amasa 'oinega 'i'abihe toholoya ,
Coinega wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Taugu moisa sipi 'adi to'itayahina bwebwe'agu , weyahina yawasigu yatagwaleya ma 'abehega 'igu sipi weyahidi ya'amasa .
Nuwana mwalo 'igu paihowa tetelina wahesagoheya , ta 'igu paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa , ma 'abehega tauna 'ina helauwega 'omi 'ami lema waloba .
Ceguma taiya nuwanuwana 'i'ahwa lasalasa tomota 'oidiya 'uhegwae ma'aigeda bo maluwa ma 'ilolagu . Ceguma geya 'ilolagu walogwahate .
Yesu 'ina gwaeyedi weyahidi meYudiya siboidimo sihe'ohe'ohena madouna , 'oinega 'oidiya wataha 'ilatuwa .
Ma hesi taiyawedi 'eguma 'ina gwaeyedi si'abi'abi yahidi , beno taudi sihepwaileya 'abehega Yehoba 'ina gwae moisa .
Ciyagwao , 'imi yamwana 'ana tuta watoho waiwai eeta 'eguma 'itauyama 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'imi mumuga bwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , ma nuwadaumwalega wamiyamiya .
Ciyamayao , nuwatuhu 'aigeda wete , nuwanuwama ma weyahima wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , ma Bada tetelina 'ima guguyega 'ihewaiwai tomota baibaiwadi 'oidiya , gide mwalo 'oimiya .
ma Yehoba 'asanapuya 'abehega 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hileya , ma tauma wete Yesu ba'idamai 'i'abihe toholo hilemai , ma 'omi wete ba'idamayao 'itoegita tauna matana .
Ta 'eguma 'aigeda 'oimiyega ma'ina lohala , hekalesiya 'ana tohanugetao 'ibwauwedima , ma si'ahwanoi weyahina , ma wete holowa 'oina silagu 'ida Bada saninega .
“ Ma tutaina 'ana bolime poti 'ilobeya , Moseseina nuwanuwana ma tasinao meIsileli 'ihabo'enedi .
Loheya bewa meYudiya si'abiyahiya ma 'i'iuna silohe'amasi , ta wasana yahesagoheya 'abehega tauna gwama Lomaina , ta tolo'alehao ba'idagwao 'atauya 'oidiya , ma nimadiyega 'alemeya .

Coinega tomota baibaiwadi sipili 'autama ma siwuiwui , ma hedagadaga besobeso sipaipaihowa , ta meMasidoniya 'eluwa si'abiyahidiya , taudi Paulo 'ina sakowasi 'oidiya 'ana to'wayabuwao , sanidi Geyo ma Alisitako , ta sipilihediya hada 'ebe 'eto'auta 'oina .
“ Moisa tuwa , Yesu tauna loheya dumwaluna ma bwebwe'ana , ma hesi walogwahateya , ta tomota 'adi tolohe'amasa 'aigeda nuwanuwami , ta weyahina Pailato 'oina wa'ahwanoiyeya .
ma geya 'aigeda wete wataha 'i'abi'abi latuhe , ta 'abehega taudi hagahagadi ma tauda hagahagada , ma hesi taudi sihemiseya gide tauda tahemiseya , ma 'oinega mabwaiyada 'ateda 'i'abihe 'ehaudi .
Ceguma nuwanuwada ma Bada 'ina 'ai ta'ai , nugeta mumugada weyahina tanuwatuhu , ma wete tada 'abihe dumwalugita , ma muliyetega 'e'ahaiina ta'ai , ma wete biyoina 'oinega tanuma .
Ma wete 'iyagwao yaloyauwedo madouna 'oimiya ta yaguguyegomi ma watoholo pa'ala ma tuta mabwaiyana wada hetapewa Bada 'ina paihowa 'oina , weyahina 'abwa Bada 'ina paihowaina 'oinega huwaina taloba .
Coinega natugwao , ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma wahe'au'aunawegau .

Weyahina sanapu bale'uwa gesowana 'oinega Yehoba tasanapu , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu ta 'ina tetela 'ana lohatotomo 'oinega 'ana tohemisao tauda 'ilemegita . Tetelinaina mebale'u siheginaula bwagabwagaeya .

Gidemusa 'omi wete tohai mewahinemi mwanemiyao wahe'asisiyanedi , eeta 'eguma taudi geya Yehoba 'ina gwae sihemisae , 'omi 'imi paihowa bwebwe'ana he'asisiyega wahe'itadi , ma 'oinega taudi wete sihemisa .
Tauma Keliso 'ana tohepwailao ta Yehoba 'oimega 'ilolohatoto 'oimiya , ma Keliso weyahina 'a'ahwanoiyegomi ma Yehoba 'oina wahe'iya'iyagu hila .
Ma Yehoba 'amasa 'ina tupwa mwauna 'oinega 'i'abiheteya ta 'i'abihetoholo hileya , weyahina geya sowasowahina ma 'amasa 'ina tupwa 'imiyamiya hataya .
Wanuwatuhuyahi wete 'abehega 'ida Bada sanina 'i'ebwaegita , ma tohewasawasaedi hesiyage saninaina si'ahwa'ahwa galagalae .
ma sahena bwasi galana 'inumanuma yauyaule , ma wete sahena 'ihehegamwagamwagu , ma hesi mumugana nuhana , ma geya 'ida 'ahwa panapanawa , wete sahena wasawasa nuwana 'i'ewa'ewa .

Ma hesi taiya 'eguma we'ahina 'oiguwega ya'ebwae ma 'inuma , nata geya'abwa wete tani'ona 'iyahayahala hila . Weyahina we'ahina 'oiguwega ya'ebwae , nata 'atena 'ihebidala yawasina miyamiya hatayana weyahina . ”
Ma 'eguma Yehoba 'ina gwae tamulimuliye 'ina helau 'oinega 'ilohemahegita ma tasanasanapu 'abehega 'iyadaina mahetedai tamiyamiya .
Ma yaluyaluwa 'etoi galadi ya'itediya , 'adi 'ita gide 'we'we silatulatuma hebaiina bwehabwehalina 'ahwanega , ma wete hebaiina holega ma wete 'ina palopita 'abo'aboina 'ahwadiyega .
Ta 'ida Bada 'ina loina madouna Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Ciyamwao 'uhelauwedi gidemusa 'owa 'uhehelauwego . ” Loina bewa 'eguma 'umuliya bwaibwaini , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana .
Cima lohatoto geya tauma weyahima , ma hesi Yesu Keliso tauna 'ida Badaina weyahina , ma tauma 'imi topaihowao tuwa Yesu weyahina .
Ta hesi gwaeyedi beno 'abo tuwa , 'oinega sahena 'oidiyega si'abowegomi , tabu ta mumugadi galana wahe'au'aunaowedi .

Yehoba miya daumwala 'ana to'ehele , ma tauna wete 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileya , ta Yesuina 'ina tohekalesiyao tauda 'ada To'itayahina moisa , ta tauna bweyahinega 'ada loina 'ausalana ta miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaegita .

Ta hesi wa'itayahigomi ma 'ane 'imi paihowao 'oidiyega tomota Keliso tetelina si'ahwa bwebwe'ane , eema 'eguma yahabo'enegomi , bo nuwana 'eguma yamiya hila , tuwa wasami bwebwe'ana yahesagohe 'abehega ma'imi 'atetagwala watoholo pa'ala , ta ma'imi nuwatuhu mahemahetena eema 'oinega wahetahetapewa wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana hemisa weyahina ,
ta wete tauna 'ina waiwaiyega 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hilegita , gidemusa 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hileya .
Wete tutaina 'oina ya'abidebegowa ta Yehoba waiwai 'i'ebwaegowa , waiwaiina 'u'itayahi ma 'ane 'oiuwega sahena 'igumwagumwala .
Bewa huhuna 'oinega wasa bwebwe'ana 'iguguyaeya to'amasao 'oidiya , ma tuta mayawasidiya 'adi loina mwauna silobeya , ma 'ane yaluyaluwadiyega yawasidi si'ewa Yehoba 'oinega .
Weyahina Kelisoina 'ihemaisegita ma tauda 'ina bodao . Gesowana watagwalegomi hali taubadao 'oidiya .
Wete Yehoba silomugiyeya , ta 'oinega 'aigeda anelose 'ihesumaneya ma 'i'abihe galediya 'idi lomugiyedi weyahidi . Cebe'ita bewa 'oida ma 'abehega sahena talolomugi .

Ma tauma geya gide tolohatoto 'abo'abowao , taudi 'idi wasawasa tuwa weyahina silolohatoto , ma hesi tauma ma'ama hemisa , gide Yehoba 'iloinemaiya , 'oinega tauna matana Keliso tetelina 'agwaegwaene moisa .
Taiyawedi tauda 'ida hemisa waiwaina sawasawahina ma 'iyadao taudi 'idi hemisa we'awe'ana ta'abihetedi . Gesowana taboidamo weyahida tanuwanuwatuhu .
Ta wete yahemisa 'abehega Bada 'ina lemega tuta 'i'iuna ma taugu wete yatauyawa yahabo'enegomi .

Ginaula bewa mulina aneloseyao 'ehata ya'itediya sitotoholo bale'u tupwanao 'adi baibaiwa 'ehata 'oidiya . Aneloseyedi yaumai 'adi baibaiwa 'ehata si'abi yahidiya ma 'abehega geya'abwa bale'uwa , nuwana holai , nuwana 'aiwe 'oidiya sitowatowa ,

Mwalo 'imi mumuga galana gidemusa taudi tomiya ganamuli , ma mumugaedi bewa walogwahatedi , gidemusa sogala ma nuwa'ubuna ma bwasi waiwaidi 'adi numa yauyaule , ma he'iya'iyagu paihowa galadi weyahidi , ma wete hemisa 'abo'abodi hali ginaulao 'oidiya .
Ma 'eguma taiya 'itoho ma 'ilo'aleha tohepwailedi 'oidiya , nata 'aiwe ninima 'ahwadiyega 'ilatuma ma 'adi 'alehaina 'isubahegala , ma bewa 'oinega 'adi 'alehao silohe'amasidi .
Ta Paulo 'igwaeya , “ Yauwedo tasigwao ! Geya yasanapu 'abehega tauna Topwaoli Madouna . Moisa tuwa Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila gidemusa 'igwae , 'Sahena 'imi toloina 'oina 'u'ahwa'ahwa pa'ala . ’ ”
Ma hesi 'asa 'atamanina 'adi tomiyanao , beno 'edewao , ma Tomudulele ma'iyanao , ma tologwaliyao , ma tolohe'amasao , ma dimwa 'adi tohemisao , ta wete to'e'abo'abowao .

“ Eema mumugami tupwana weyahina geya yayaliyaya , weyahina tupwami Balami 'ina he'itao wamulimuliyedi . Ta 'ina he'itaowedi mwalo Balaki 'imuliyediya , ta meIsileli mumuga galana 'ihe'itediya , beno dimwa sihemisaeya , ta 'ana si'ebwaeya , ta to'eheleyedi 'e'ahaiina si'aiya , ta wete silogwaliya .
Ciyamayao , 'ilobwainemaiya tuta mabwaiyana 'aloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , 'imi hemisao ma 'imi helauwao waboi 'oimiya 'adi madou weyahina .
Weyahina mwalo tupwa guguyou 'oina wamiyamiya ta hali 'ebe hemisao 'oidiya watagwalegomiya , taudi geya sawasawahidi ma sigwae , ma hesi si'abowegomiya .
Haihainimi meloheyami 'ilobwainegomiya ma mwanemiyao wahelauwedi , gidemusa Keliso 'ina tohekalesiyao 'ihelauwegita , eeta tauna 'itagwaleya ta weyahida 'i'amasa ,
Ma 'eguma taiyawedi silo'alehegomi , sahena mumuga galana 'oinega wahehemaisedi , ma hesi wahemaisedi mumugaedi gide tomotai mabwaiyadi si'ahwa'ahwa bwebwe'ane 'oidiyega .
Coinega wanuwadobi ma watagwalegomi Yehoba Tohewaiwai moisa nimana , ma 'oinega muliyetega tauna 'ina tuta bwebwe'ana 'oina 'igihanehegomi .

ma 'ebe he'itao 'oidiya simiyamiya , ta 'abehega 'oidiyega Yehobaina sida sanasanapu . Ma 'ebe he'itaowedi 'ina helauwedi 'oidiya ta 'omi 'oimiya , beno 'wesu galewega ma wete siwaloha bwebwe'ana ma 'oidiyega 'eli'eli bwebwe'ana walobaloba , ta 'oinega wa'ai'ai ma weyahina wayaliyaliyaya . ”
Mwanediyao wete gide ma'idi nuwatuhu dumwadumwaluna , ma sahena 'iyadiyao si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , sahena bwasi galana sinumanuma hedade , ma hesi siguibiga moisa .
Ma wahineina 'ina tuta ya'ebwae pwaiya ma 'abehega 'ina puiyedi 'oidiyega 'ida nuwabui , ma hesi genuwana ma 'ina logwali 'ilogwahate .
